title: Please help identifying font on Marilyn Manson picture (industrial?)
content:
Hi,

I am looking for the name of this font (MM):

[http://www.showandtellonline.com/images\_splash/marilyn\_manson.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20070908122002/http:/www.showandtellonline.com/images_splash/marilyn_manson.jpg "http://www.showandtellonline.com/images\_splash/marilyn\_manson.jpg")

Do you have any idea what it’s called?

Thanks in advance,  
knarkfisk

Edit: How do you get the image to show up in the post?

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [marilyn\_manson.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20070908122002/http:/typophile.com/files/marilyn_manson.jpg) | 15.39 KB |

 [‹ (x) Looking for contemporary alternatives to Rotis Semi Serif - various {gang}](http://web.archive.org/web/20070908122002/http:/typophile.com/node/33960 "Go to previous forum topic") [(x) Tech sans on "Dundee Degree Show" poster - ITC Conduit {Jonathon Russell} ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20070908122002/http:/typophile.com/node/33931 "Go to next forum topic")
author: knarkfisk

comments.content: Looks like it could be a custom job.
